functions.tag: {display:{Name:"{\"text\":\"Alstroemeria\",\"color\":\"light_purple\",\"italic\":false}",Lore:['{"text":"Some things are only to be had by","color":"gray"}','{"text":"the dead, and so they are bestowed","color":"gray"}','{"text":"with these flowers as the only thing","color":"gray"}','{"text":"left that the world can offer. Not a","color":"gray"}','{"text":"hope, but a beautiful memory for","color":"gray"}','{"text":"those left behind.
